Course Preview

The Game of Life

Making the Right Decisions

Enrol Now

Explore topic outline

Explore the course outline prepared to give you a strong foundation in mastery

Course Description
  • The Game of Life is a short course that you can complete in just under 2 hours to be equipped with the skills to understand yourself and the world better to discern and make the wiser decisions in life.
  • You will learn how does our decisions in games give insights to the decisions we make in real life. We will explore the Golden Circle by Simon Sinek on communicating from the Why (Values, cause, Belief).
  • We will also explore the theory of Finite and Infinite Games by James P. Carse on understanding the parameters of the world you live in to know what to do and what not to do.
  • In learning these concepts, you will be able to have a better idea on who you are, what career you might want to grow in, and how to live out the way you were designed to be. It will also be a practical session and not just concepts where they are required to play an online game, set goals, and identify their values in life.
What will students learn in the course?
  • Decision making
  • Values and Ethics
  • Leadership and Followership
  • Goal setting
  • Life management
Are there any course requirements or prerequisites?
  • None
Who can join the course?
  • Anyone who wants to have a clearer understanding on their values.
  • Anyone willing to learn and grow
  • Anyone who wants to gain insights in decision making

Even the smallest decision-making can change your life for the better

Learn from the Experts who walk the talk

Meet your professional instructor to guide you on your learning journey and beyond.

Mr Eddryll Teo

Head, MPU (Mata Pelajaran Umum)
